rateLimit.title: Too Many Attempts
rateLimit.message: You've made too many requests. Please try again in {{time}}.
rateLimit.generic: Too many requests. Please try again later.

deleteDialog.softDeleteDescription: Item will be marked as deleted but can be recovered
deleteDialog.permanentDeleteDescription: Item and all associated files will be permanently removed
deleteDialog.permanentDeleteConfirmation: I understand this action is permanent and cannot be undone
deleteDialog.forceDeleteDescription: If checked, related data will be automatically deleted. If unchecked, deletion will fail if related data exists.
deleteDialog.relatedDataError: Cannot delete: user has related data. Please enable force delete option and try again.
